title: 求翻译一下mod的配置文件,请不要机翻~
author: Sue_
txt_content:
#spawnWeight = Relative spawn weight. The lower the less common. 10=pigs. 0=off
#spawnLimit = Maximum spawn count in the World.
#minGroupSize = Minimum spawn group count.
#maxGroupSize = Maximum spawn group count.
#canDespawn = It will despawn, if it lets things go. 
#checkOwnerName = At local, make sure the name of the owner. 
#antiDoppelganger = Not to survive the doppelganger. 
#enableSpawnEgg = Enable LMM SpawnEgg Recipe. 
#VoiceDistortion = LittleMaid Voice distortion.
#defaultTexture = Default selected Texture Packege. Null is Random
#DebugMessage = Print Debug Massages.
#DeathMessage = Print Death Massages.
#Dominant = Spawn Anywhere.
#Aggressive = true: Will be hostile, false: Is a pacifist
#
#Wed Dec 17 13:48:24 UTC 2014
cfg_DeathMessage=true
cfg_defaultTexture=
cfg_canDespawn=false
cfg_antiDoppelganger=true
cfg_checkOwnerName=false
cfg_enableSpawnEgg=true
cfg_spawnWeight=5
cfg_VoiceDistortion=true
cfg_minGroupSize=1
cfg_Dominant=true
cfg_spawnLimit=20
cfg_Aggressive=true
cfg_PrintDebugMessage=true
cfg_maxGroupSize=3

replies.author: c37
replies.txt_content:
下面那段不翻译也知道吧？翻译了mod放到配置文件里面就不能读取了。不过这段#开头的注释写进去启动一次游戏也会覆盖掉，mod的尿性。

#spawnWeight = Relative spawn weight. The lower the less common. 10=pigs. 0=off
#spawnLimit = Maximum spawn count in the World.
#minGroupSize = Minimum spawn group count.
#maxGroupSize = Maximum spawn group count.
#canDespawn = It will despawn, if it lets things go. 
#checkOwnerName = At local, make sure the name of the owner. 
#antiDoppelganger = Not to survive the doppelganger. 
#enableSpawnEgg = Enable LMM SpawnEgg Recipe. 
#VoiceDistortion = LittleMaid Voice distortion.
#defaultTexture = Default selected Texture Packege. Null is Random
#DebugMessage = Print Debug Massages.
#DeathMessage = Print Death Massages.
#Dominant = Spawn Anywhere.
#Aggressive = true: Will be hostile, false: Is a pacifist看起来貌似是女仆mod的配置文件？你为何不找找汉化的。。
不过汉化版也不一定汉化配置文件就对了。。
找教程呗？

#spawnWeight=相对生成量.设置越低越稀有.10=大量. 0=关闭
#spawnLimit=这个世界内最大生成数.
#minGroupSize=最小生成组数.
#maxGroupSize=最大生成组数.
#canDespawn=设置为true:实体删除机制生效.
#checkOwnerName=检查所有者的名称.
#antiDoppelganger=禁止生成分身.
#enableSpawnEgg=启用LMM怪物蛋合成.
#VoiceDistortion= 输出LittleMaid语音.
#defaultTexture=选择默认纹理包.设置为空随机选择
#DebugMessage=调试信息输出.
#DeathMessage=死亡信息输出.
#Dominant=生成在任何地方.
#Aggressive=设置成true:生气变成敌对状态,设置成false:保持和平状态复制代码有些没用过女仆mod真不知道这是啥意思。。
作为翻译机也救不了的一代，我只能这样抛种子引大触了。
{:10_501:}
